title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 8.17 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 8.17 - Records

State Regulations

Each person who holds a grade marking stamp or stencil
shall keep a record of all cheese to which such grade markings have been
applied. Such record shall include the date of manufacture, the vat number, and
the grade assigned to such cheese. These records shall be open to inspection by
the commissioner or his representatives and shall be kept for at least two
years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

8.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
